website_summaries.verdict: For those who prefer a faster "flash card" memorization system over a traditional textbook, this a good path to consider.
pros: Contains a total of 450 flash cards, covering all sections of the GED
Cards can be mounted on a ring and organized by topic
Good for diagnosing strengths and weaknesses
cons: Many cards contain too much text to work as true "flash card" study aids
Focus is on test tips and advice, not areas of study

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really should have paid more attention to the negative reviews. I purchased these to help my daughter study and found these cards are mostly "tips" on what one can expect to find on the GED. The information on the few practice problems there are, are too long for sight learning. I needed pre-test material for her to think on her feet during the exam. These are not the Flashcards you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ani turner

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: These basically just give you suggestions on what to study, they do not actually have practice problems. They are good for telling you what to study and help you realize what you need to get better at by pointing out your strengths and weaknesses. I used mine to study for about two months before I took my test and they were decently helpful but I recommend getting a practice book or something that helps you practice. These do not have practice questions, just a bunch of test information and what to expect on the test which is all pretty straight forward really. Goof but not great. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Codyk

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for the help
customer_reviews.text: These were all I needed. I'm green in all zones now, so I'm ready to pass the test thanks to these cards. The little lines on the sides of the cards makes it easy to organize them back into subjects - I've dropped them plenty of times to know if those lines were not there I'd probably still be sorting them. They are very easy for me to understand, I was able to find my problem areas by going through each subject and studying the cards. Which led me to being able to find the right classes I needed. I will reuse these in the future to touch up on skills, and for my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Not Flash Card Material
customer_reviews.text: Most of the flash cards have too much info. It’s like a book was printed out on flash cards. Had i known, i would have opted for a manual or study guide book instead of these cards which have no table of contents really. I can see these working well for some but not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jambalaya Curry

customer_reviews.title: I personal don't like this method of learning
customer_reviews.text: I personal don't like this method of learning, I thought by it have a online site that claims to help if you need it, I was unable to get the help I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Allana

customer_reviews.title: Many of the "flashcards" are too lengthy and not easy to use as true flashcards
customer_reviews.text: Many of the "flashcards" are too lengthy and not easy to use as true flashcards. It is like they took bits of text and copy/pasted onto the cards without streamlining. I was expecting there to be more vocabulary or single topics per card. Some cards had several vocabulary words on a single card. Other cards had no vocabulary. I also planned on having students quiz one another with the cards. These will not work for that purpose. They did give me some talking points or areas from which to create a lesson.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: A waste of money poorly made writing so small hard to keep together not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE FLASH CARDS - THESE ARE THE GREATEST AND ...

customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Don't know where to start
customer_reviews.text: Can the have made the writing any smaller? I had to get a MAGNIFYING GLASS to read the questions and to answer them, you have to be a college grad.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B. Falgout

customer_reviews.title: it was great and now I have my
customer_reviews.text: This flash cards really help me with my preparation for the GED exam a, it was great and now I have my certificate

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and valuable
customer_reviews.text: Very handy and loaded with valuable information. Pocket size allows to carry these cards with you anywhere and study anytime you have a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Bell

customer_reviews.title: Study away
customer_reviews.text: The cards are great for my son to learn from. Just another tool for his success.

customer_reviews.title: Bring on the test!
customer_reviews.text: These study materials are easy to use and they helped tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA J SHACKLEFORD

customer_reviews.title: GED prep
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was more test questions and answers it’s not For quick quiz

customer_reviews.title: Okay flash cards
customer_reviews.text: A good way to ease into studying for the GED

customer_reviews.title: Not Helpful for Test
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for an adult GED class that I teach and my students didn't find these helpful for the tests. I thought they would be helpful, butmaybe not.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I like the answers on the back are simple and on point...pretty cool and fast learning process

customer_reviews.title: We really like the ring that comes with the cards
customer_reviews.text: We really like the ring that comes with the cards. This is easy for my boyfriend to study at work

customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied I think these flash cards. Very helpful and I love the separator ring!

customer_reviews.title: He passed
customer_reviews.text: These cards really helped my son study for his GED. Math was his weak link and he passed--the most important test of how well they worked.

customer_reviews.title: They provide what I need to study.
customer_reviews.text: These are more my type of style when it comes to studying, I have not used all the cards but the few I have used, I can tell are going to be wonderful for when I get serious about studying for my ged test.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Great cards
customer_reviews.text: I love these cards. Its helping me understand so much.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor test prep material. Not flash cards at all but passages to read and interpret. If you're looking for a good and different way of reviewing for the GED, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Carol H

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of flash cards.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of flash cards for anyone looking to study for the GED. The box is broken down into 4 parts and has a ring that you can easily put a section of cards on for easy transport while studying. The questions vary from tips and tricks to multiple choice and definitions. I am pleased with the way this is outlined to study and it has already helped my student greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: I love the flash cards they really help and you can ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the flash cards they really help and you can understand all the words and the words are not to small for you to read.....

customer_reviews.title: Don't spend money on this.
customer_reviews.text: I would did not spend money on these again because it is not enough to study the GED.even it is not good flashcards to learn all the information that you need.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Mohamed yussuf

customer_reviews.title: Meh... just get the Kaplan book
customer_reviews.text: These flashcards are not as useful as I would have hoped. Got them for my sister in law who is studying for the GED, but after I looked through them, I figured she'd be better off with other study materials. I've never had to take the GED myself, but in my assessment it would not be an effective use of study time.
customer_reviews.author: A Dubb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great no problem recd product as promised.Gave to my Landscaper for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Jose nieves

customer_reviews.title: They ate helpful with great information & insight I to what is next to ...
customer_reviews.text: They ate helpful with great information & insight I to what is next to be known for the test. A helpful study guide.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Mullins
